vclaim: Rapper Ja Rules’ NFT platform, Flipkick, is auctioning the rights to the Fyre Festival tweet about the cheese sandwich and salad, which they estimate will go for up to $80,000.
title: Is Ja Rule Auctioning Rights to Viral Fyre Festival Sandwich Tweet?
subtitle: The tweet was described as a “Meme. Cultural touchstone. Cheese sandwich.”
author: Nur Ibrahim
